Functions

toolbox!

Function Keywords

ec::EChart
show::Bool = true
restore::Bool = true
dataView::Bool = true
saveAsImage::Bool = true
chartTypes::AbstractVector = []

Examples

using ECharts
x = 1:20
y = 3 .+ 5x
a = bar(x = x, y = y)
title!(a, text = "Bar Plot Title", subtext = "Secondary Title")
toolbox!(a, chartTypes = ["bar", "line"])
